Sentencas: In this work, a novel biomass and solar energy hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating, and power (CCHP) system is proposed, including solar-driven biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell, homogeneous charge compression ignition engine, double-effect absorption chiller, and waste heat recovery unit.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a novel hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating-and power (CCHP) system-integrated solar-driven biomass gasification for achieving sustainable and efficient poly-generation

Sentencas: The aim of this work is to explore the feasibility of the proposed system from thermodynamic and environmental perspectives.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a novel hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating-and power (CCHP) system-integrated solar-driven biomass gasification for achieving sustainable and efficient poly-generation

Sentencas: Based on the thermodynamic modeling, the comprehensive performance of the proposed system is evaluated by multiple methods, including energy, exergy, exergoeconomic, and environmental analyses.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a novel hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating-and power (CCHP) system-integrated solar-driven biomass gasification for achieving sustainable and efficient poly-generation

Sentencas: Furthermore, it was compared with a reference system without solar energy to illustrate the advantages of the proposed system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a novel hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating-and power (CCHP) system-integrated solar-driven biomass gasification for achieving sustainable and efficient poly-generation

Sentencas: It is found that the total energy and exergy efficiency of the hybrid system are 57.5% and 36.6% under design condition, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a novel hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating-and power (CCHP) system-integrated solar-driven biomass gasification for achieving sustainable and efficient poly-generation

Sentencas: The energy and exergy efficiency of the proposed system are 2.7% and 2.1% higher than those of the reference system, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a novel hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating-and power (CCHP) system-integrated solar-driven biomass gasification for achieving sustainable and efficient poly-generation

Sentencas: The introduction of solar energy significantly increases the utilization rate and the generating capacity of the unit biomass by 63.8% and 36.3%, respectively, compared to the reference system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a novel hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating-and power (CCHP) system-integrated solar-driven biomass gasification for achieving sustainable and efficient poly-generation

Sentencas: In addition, the carbon emission of the proposed system is about 0.071 to 0.075 t/GJ and 46.3% lower than that of the reference system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a novel hybrid fuel cell-combined cooling, heating-and power (CCHP) system-integrated solar-driven biomass gasification for achieving sustainable and efficient poly-generation
